#Text=COURT OF KINGS BENCH—Monday, Jan. 16.
#Text=REFUSAL TO PAY RATES THE KING V.
#Text=THE JUSTICES OF LIVERPOOL.

#Text=Sir James Scarlett said he was anxious to press upon the court a motion occasioned by a disputed construction of an act of parliament passed last year, for regulating parochial rates in the town of Liverpool.
#Text=The dispute between the parish officers and the inhabitants had led to the suspension of civil process, to the great injury of the poor.
#Text=The motion he had to make was for a Mandamus to the justices of Liverpool, commanding them to issue their warrant to Mr.
#Text=Ellis, one of the parish officers, for the purpose of distraining for poor rates, &c.
#Text=The parish of Liverpool contains about 30,000 houses, 15,000 of which are rated as low as £12.
#Text=The consequence had been that the rates were seldom paid by the poor occupiers.

#Text=The act of parliament of last year, which was passed to afford the parish a remedy., provides that in all cases where houses are assessed at £12, the lessee or owner shall, after the passing of the act, be assessed to the poor and church rate.

#Text=It appeared by the affidavit in support of this application, that after the passing of the act, a vestry meeting took place, and a rate was made ; but instead of being a rate for the poor and church, it was for the poor and county rate.
#Text=The owners of £12 houses refused to pay the said rate, on the ground that the act only made them liable to pay the poor rate and ecclesiastical rate.
#Text=Having resisted payment, they were summoned before the magistrates, who decided that the law was with the defendants, and therefore they would not issue distress warrants.
#Text=Sir James Scarlett contended that the act never was intended to absolve the owners and lessees of £12 houses from the payment of county rates.
#Text=On the contrary, the county rates were always paid out of the poor rates.
#Text=Lord Tenterden—All the difficulty is occasioned by the form of your rate.
#Text=Sir J.
#Text=Scarlett^—The town of Manchester and other populous places are in the same predicament.
#Text=All is paid out of the poor rate.
#Text=Mr.
#Text=Justice Littledale—The act of Parliament may not authorise this rate in the form presented.
#Text=Sir James Scarlett said it was desirable the court should come to a decision on the subject.
#Text=The justices would act upon the suggestion of the court.
#Text=Lord Tenterden—You may take a rule to shew cause why a Mandamus should not issue to the justices, commanding them to compel the payment of the rate.
#Text=Rule to show cause allowed.
